name: One shot (synedra)
description:
Небольшой интерактивный рассказ на английском.

Suppose you have a bomb. It sounds like a cool thing to have, because you can threaten to blow up everyone. You can demand things and stuff. Now suppose you, everyone, and the bomb are in the same room. Still pretty cool, but maybe now you’d look for a reason not to blow up everyone. Maybe now everyone will demand things from you.
